means: 无主地的，无不动产的，无陆地的

sentence.Network_en: We are giving an equal area of land to the landless.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们向无耕地者分发同等面积的土地。

sentence.Network_en: This project is designed to help landless people.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一项目旨在帮助那些没有土地的人。

sentence.Network_en: In those years the landless peasants were brought to beggary.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那些年月里无地的农民一贫如洗.

entry.def: Someone who is landless is prevented from owning the land that they farm.
